name: Devilish Cheese Ball
author: Kimber
summary: Every one loves this! Ham meat spread and olives really liven up the usual cheese ball ingredients. Serve with crackers.
ingredients: 1 (4 ounce) can deviled ham meat spread
½ cup creamy salad dressing, e.g. Miracle Whip ™
1 (2.25 ounce) can chopped black olives, liquid reserved
directions: In a medium bowl, mix together deviled ham meat spread, cream cheese, creamy salad dressing, pecans, black olives, approximately 2 tablespoons reserved black olive liquid and black pepper
Chill in the refrigerator at least two hours
Allow to stand at room temperature approximately 25 minutes before serving
